hotels.name: Sachsenpark-Hotel
hotels.description:
This modern, 4-star hotel is located directly opposite Leipzig's exhibition centre, 8 km from the city centre. It offers free parking and free Wi-Fi internet hotspot.
The tastefully furnished rooms at Sachsenpark-Hotel offer a bathroom with bathtub.
A breakfast buffet is provided each morning. The hotel restaurant offers seasonal specialities and a range of fine wines.
Guests are welcome to relax in the Sachsenpark-Hotel's sauna lounge, available for a fee.
A tram stop is just a 10-minute walk away from the hotel, and with public transport Leipzig city centre can be reached in around 20 minutes.
Nord is a great choice for travellers interested in convenient public transport, zoos and sightseeing.

hotels.name: LOGINN Hotel Leipzig by ACHAT
hotels.description:
Situated just 800 m from the Messe Leipzig congress centre, LOGINN Hotel Leipzig by ACHAT features a 24-hour reception as well as a media corner, a shared lounge and a fitness room. Free WiFi and free private parking are available on site.
The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, a kettle and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and toiletries.
A breakfast buffet is available each morning. Guests can also relax in the restaurant or the bar.
Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golf. Zoo Leipzig is 6 km from the hotel, while Panometer Leipzig is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Leipzig/Halle Airport, 12 km from LOGINN Hotel Leipzig by ACHAT.

hotels.name: NH Leipzig Messe
hotels.description:
This hotel offers free WiFi, varied cuisine and an attractive spa area. It stands beside the Leipzig-Mitte motorway junction, just a 10-minute walk from Leipzig Trade Fair.
All rooms at the 4-star NH Leipzig Messe include satellite TV, air conditioning and a minibar. The bathroom features a hairdryer and the superior room also have bathrobes and slippers.
The NH offers a large breakfast buffet each morning. At other meal times, a wide range of dishes are served in the restaurant or outside on the terrace.
NH Leipzig Messe is just a few steps from the Sachsenpark shopping centre. Trams run directly to Leipzig’s city centre and main train station. Leipzig Airport is 15 minutes away by car.

hotels.name: ACHAT Hotel Leipzig Messe
hotels.description:
This hotel lies in the north of Leipzig offers good road access to the A14 motorway. It offers Italian cuisine, free parking and a shuttle to the airport and the Leipzig Exhibition Centre.
The bright and modern rooms of the ACHAT Hotel Leipzig Messe all include satellite TV, Wi-Fi and a private bathroom.
A breakfast buffet is available at the ACHAT Hotel Leipzig Messe. Casa Luigi e Vino Bar serves Mediterranean cuisine and select wines. Free Wi-Fi is available here and in the lobby bar. The terrace is open in summer.
The ACHAT’s airport shuttle is available from 07:00 to 20:00 throughout the week (charges apply).

hotels.name: Days Inn Leipzig Messe
hotels.description:
This hotel offers modern rooms with a walk-in wardrobe. It is in Leipzig’s northern district of Wiederitzsch, 1 km from the Leipziger Messe Trade Fair.
All of the rooms at the Days Inn Leipzig Messe have a TV and a large private bathroom.
A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the Days Inn’s breakfast room. In the evening, the hotel bar is open serving drinks and snacks. Guests can enjoy use of a sauna upon request from 7:00 until 22:00 (charges apply)
From the Days Inn Leipzig Messe it takes less than 20 minutes to reach Leipzig Central Station by tram. The Georg-Herwegh-Straße Tram Stop is 150 m from the hotel.
Guests can use their hotel card for free access to public transportation within Leipzig.

hotels.name: Novum Hotel Aviva Leipzig Neue Messe
hotels.description:
Located less than 3 km from the Leipzig Exhibition Centre, this 4-star hotel has modern, stylish rooms. Novum Hotel Aviva Leipzig Neue Messe also features a breakfast room and panoramic views of Leipzig.
The colourful rooms have a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. Heated floors and soundproofing is provided in the rooms and apartments at the Novum Hotel Aviva Leipzig Neue Messe.
A full buffet breakfast is served each morning at the Novum Hotel Aviva Leipzig Neue Messe.
In sunny weather, guests can relax on the outdoor terrace. Reception can offer advice on what to see and do in Leipzig.
Public parking is available on-site for a small charge. The hotel is 9 km from Leipzig Halle Airport. Leipzig Main Station and Leipzig city centre are just 5 km from the hotel.
Nordost is a great choice for travellers interested in zoos, city trips and shopping.
